name: test_storage_re_use_different_cluster
description:
Tests that we can reuse storage from a different cluster.

    For that, we completely remove the application while keeping the storages,
    and then we deploy a new application with storage reuse and check that the
    storage has been reused.
descriptionHtml:
Tests that we can reuse storage from a different cluster.

For that, we completely remove the application while keeping the storages,
and then we deploy a new application with storage reuse and check that the
storage has been reused.

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skip('This is currently unsupported on MongoDB charm.')

tags: @pytest.mark.skip('This is currently unsupported on MongoDB charm.')
